sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { collapsed = true; @Output() featureSelected = new EventEmitter(); onSelect(feature:string) { this.featureSelected.emit(feature); } }
